Experience
The Biomarkers for Social, Psychological Health & Education Retention Explorers Lab | Project Coordinator | August 2021 to Present

title: Megan Hokama, MA
text:
I am a PhD candidate, researcher, and educator in education  with a passion for fostering research identity and self-efficacy  in underrepresented undergraduate students.
My research focuses on digital game-based learning  to enhance data literacy and motivation, with committment  to creating open-source learning spaces  that inspire and support future researchers.

Learn more about me
